predicate.note: Frames file for 'repossess' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.5. Technically "possess again", but actual meaning has drifted from that rather dramatically.

roleset.name: take back material goods

example.name: repo man
example.text: After Laurel Bank tried *trace* to repossess the car, a vice president asked him to intervene in an unrelated legal dispute involving a trust account.

roleset.note: Could be a 'source' argument ("The bank repossessed the car from John") but it sounds a little awkward and the corpus doesn't have enough examples.
